revision.text:
'''Kanto''' is the first [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world, where the player starts the game. The Pokédex for this region contains 151 Pokémon from Bulbasaur to Mew. Uniquely to this region, certain Pokémon can only be found in the [[Safari Zone]]. [[File:Kanto Town Map 0.8.3.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Kanto region]] ===[[Towns_%26_Cities|Towns, Cities]], and [[Shops]]=== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pallet Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pewter City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cerulean City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Vermilion City]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Celadon City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Fuschia City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Lavender Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Saffron City]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cinnabar Island]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Viridian City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Indigo Plateau Kanto]] || |} ===Unique Locations=== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Pokémon Day Care]] || [[Farm]] || [[Underground|Underground Entrance]] |- | [[Safari Zone]] || [[Dock]] || |} ===Routes=== ''See [[Route Statistics]] for more in-depth info.'' Note that water Pokémon can only be caught after the [[Super rod]] is obtained upon defeating 10 Pokémon on Route 12. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! [[Cerulean Cave]] |- | ''Wild Pokémon'': [[File:Arbok.png|30px]]Arbok, [[File:Raichu.png|30px]]Raichu, [[File:Sandslash.png|30px]]Sandslash, [[File:Golbat.png|30px]]Golbat, [[File:Gloom.png|30px]]Gloom, [[File:Parasect.png|30px]]Parasect, [[File:Venomoth.png|30px]]Venomoth, [[File:Weepinbell.png|30px]]Weepinbell, [[File:Graveler.png|30px]]Graveler, [[File:Ditto.png|30px]]Ditto, [[File:Chansey.png|30px]]Chansey, [[File:Magikarp.png|30px]]Magikarp, [[File:Poliwag.png|30px]]Poliwag, [[File:Goldeen.png|30px]]Goldeen, [[File:Seaking.png|30px]]Seaking, [[File:Rhydon.png|30px]]'''Rhydon''', [[File:Mewtwo.png|30px]]'''Mewtwo''' |} ===Flow Chart Walkthrough=== [[File:Kanto_Flow_Chart_0.8.2_Updated.png|500px]] *The Dock is unlocked after the completion of the Kanto Pokédex *Route 5 is located South of Cerulean City *Pokémon Tower is located in Lavender Town *Route 21 is located South of Pallet Town *Viridian City Gym is Located in Viridian City *Either Route 15 or 18 unlocks Fuchsia City *Either Route 20 or 21 Unlocks Cinnabar Island *The Thunder (Vermillion City Gym) and Marsh (Saffron City Gym) Badges do not need to be obtained to progress through most of the region. It is only necessary to obtain the Thunder and Marsh Badges to unlock the Viridian City Gym. *Route 22 must be completed to access Route 23 ===Exclusive Pokémon=== ====[[Fossils]] ==== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- !
